member.name: T:Elysium.Theme.ViewModels.ViewModelBase
member.summary: Provides common functionality for ViewModel classes

member.name: T:Elysium.Theme.Commands.CommandReference
member.summary: This class facilitates associating a key binding in XAML markup to a command defined in a View Model by exposing a Command dependency property. The class derives from Freezable to work around a limitation in WPF when data-binding from XAML.

member.name: T:Elysium.Theme.Commands.DelegateCommand
member.summary: This class allows delegating the commanding logic to methods passed as parameters, and enables a View to bind commands to objects that are not part of the element tree.

member.name: M:Elysium.Theme.Commands.DelegateCommand.CanExecute
member.summary: Method to determine if the command can be executed

member.name: M:Elysium.Theme.Commands.DelegateCommand.OnCanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Protected virtual method to raise CanExecuteChanged event

member.name: P:Elysium.Theme.Commands.DelegateCommand.IsAutomaticRequeryDisabled
member.summary: Property to enable or disable CommandManager's automatic requery on this command

member.summary: This class allows delegating the commanding logic to methods passed as parameters, and enables a View to bind commands to objects that are not part of the element tree.

member.name: T:Elysium.Theme.Commands.CommandManagerHelper
member.summary: This class contains methods for the CommandManager that help avoid memory leaks by using weak references.
